content: You will keep your full {{amount}} access until the end of your paid billing period. If your storage exceeds the new limit at the start of the next period, youâ€™ll be charged for the actual usage, rounded to the nearest {{storageUnit}}.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message informing users about their storage usage and potential additional charges at the start of their next billing period. The message appears in the Portal Settings category of the client application.
